name: Ice Hatch
description:
Curling, but penguins. Guide the penguins to hatch their stray eggs on slippery thin ice.

Play with a mouse or a touch screen. Rules are explained in-game. (Note: don't panic, penguins can swim and stay safely in water.)

Feedback will be much appreciated! Also, while it's polar day in Antarctica, the Winter Olympic Games are going on in Beijing, China; tune in if that interests!

Mini Jam 99 entry (theme: Birds; limitation: Can't stop moving).

Source repo on GitHub.

Did not manage to make the sound, but I'm already putting together a piece of music for it, will update soon!

Change log

  • 9 Feb, 03:45 UTC: Fixed eggs spawning too close to ice blocks.
